backend/main.mo: Defines maps and data types for journeys, cities, media, schedules, bookmarks, and user profiles, initializing registry and access control state in an actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend source files describing their roles and recent enhancements.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx and including the suncalc library.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Bootstraps providers and renders BackendDebugger, LocationMapExplorer, and global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Provides UI for managing journeys and schedules with calendar popovers, mutations, and multiple management panels.
Exposes backend actor and debugging utilities to the browser console for development purposes.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: UI for selecting cities, uploading media, managing social media links, and editing city albums with validation and file storage integration.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty or placeholder component with no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Admin interface for importing, searching, paginating, creating, editing, and deleting Geoname city records with file parsing and validation.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Interactive 10-heart fractional rating component supporting hover, click-based precision, and read‑only mode.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Three.js-based interactive globe with timezone overlays, labels, flight animation, and various visualization toggles.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for creating or updating location info, including image upload, preview, deletion, and associated backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel using Internet Identity with login/logout, status display, and session handling.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Leaflet-based map component managing markers for travel spots, bookmarks, and schedule items with custom icons and focus behavior.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and embedded social media content with tabbed navigation and media-type detection utilities.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting music albums and songs with file uploads and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Popup music browser showing albums and songs, enabling selection and playback triggers when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Bottom music player handling audio playback, song navigation, volume, and integrating user layout preferences.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Provides UI for uploading, validating, storing, and manually executing sync of timezone GeoJSON data using backend and IndexedDB.
frontend/src/components/TravelogueJourne: Displays journey schedule items on a Leaflet map, dynamically loading the library, geocoding locations, and rendering markers.
Shows journeys and schedules with filtering, editing, and navigation hooks, including date/time formatting and collapsible UI.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: Manages CRUD for travel spots, including media uploads and social media links, with dialogs, forms, and city-based filtering.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Aggregates bookmarks and travel spots by city, enriches items with spot types, and displays them in collapsible groups with icons.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: React panel component for managing website layout preferences such as music player visibility and default search location, with dialogs, tabs, and update handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and auth client setup with status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data-fetching and mutation hooks using react-query, including geocoding, social media URL validation, and website layout preference operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for theming, including light/dark mode and custom component color sets.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Provides a solar declination calculator and simple console-based test cases for key seasonal dates.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Finds timezone IDs matching a given UTC offset by computing and rounding each zone’s current offset.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Loads, caches, and validates timezone boundary GeoJSON using IndexedDB and optional backend fetching.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Utility functions for rendering timezone overlays on a 3D globe, including coordinate conversion, longitude unwrapping, and timezone offset matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with query client and Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Empty placeholder file for a country map explorer page.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Implements an interactive 2D/3D map UI with search, timezone overlays, panels, flight animations, and URL‑state syncing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, setting, and clearing URL parameters using hash‑based or regular routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and components with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state for changing the Travelogue Map button to navigate to a 2D view and focus the selected journey/schedule item, listing existing features and a pending request.
